surveyDescription: Post-bill inquiry survey for customer billing experiences

answers.text: I noticed a billing discrepancy on my latest statement. I was charged for a service I did not use. I spoke with customer support and was told it would be reviewed. The charges appeared again on the next bill. This caused me to worry about my monthly budget, especially since I rely on accurate statements. I checked my account online and found no usage that would justify the charge. I requested a credit or reversal, and the agent promised to investigate within 3 business days. It has been over a week, and I still haven't seen any adjustments. I would like this resolved promptly to avoid ongoing financial strain. I want more transparent communication about why these charges occurred.

incidents.description: Discrepancy on latest bill; potential duplicate charge.

scores.text: Negative sentiment aligned with billing issue

surveyDescription: Customer feedback on recent billing issue

answers.text: I recently received a bill that looked incorrect. The charges included a fee I did not expect and an amount that did not match my plan. I double-checked my usage meters and found that the billing cycle dates were inconsistent with what I recall. When I called customer support, I was put on hold for a long time and the agent could not explain the extra charges. This left me frustrated and concerned about recurring billing mistakes. I asked for a clear breakdown of each charge, but the agent sent a generic summary that did not align with my invoice. The issue affected my ability to budget for the month, and I worried about potential upcoming charges. I would like a thorough review of my recent bill and a corrected statement as soon as possible. I hope the company will take steps to prevent similar errors in the future.

incidents.description: Billing dispute due to an unrecognized charge on invoice 1234
Invoice corrected to reflect correct usage charge

socialReview.text: Negative feedback posted about billing experience

surveyDescription: Customer satisfaction survey for billing issues

answers.text: I recently received a bill that included charges I did not expect and some entries that did not match my usage. I reviewed the statement and compared it to my previous bills, and the discrepancies were clear. I attempted to reach customer service to get an explanation, but the process was slow and the response was not helpful. This experience has left me frustrated about how billing is communicated.

Additionally, I was charged a late payment fee despite paying on time according to my records. The explanation provided did not reference the specific line items or the dates of usage, leaving me uncertain about what triggered the fee. I called the support line twice and waited on hold for more than 15 minutes each time. The lack of detail and the delays have eroded my trust in how my account is managed.

For a resolution, I would like a full review of the billing period in question, a corrected bill if appropriate, and a clear itemized explanation of all charges. I value transparent communication and timely updates when discrepancies are found. I would appreciate an assurance that future bills will show dates and usage in a way I can easily verify. If possible, Iâ€™d prefer the credit to be issued to my account or a refund if the charges were incorrect.

socialReview.text: Customer posted a negative comment about billing issues.

answers.text: I recently checked my bill and found charges that don't match my usage. The invoice shows extra fees that were not communicated clearly. I contacted customer service but the issue remains unresolved after multiple calls. The billing cycle had an unexplained adjustment that increased my charge without any notice. I expect accurate billing and transparent explanations for any changes. The support agent listened but did not provide a satisfactory resolution or timeline. This has caused frustration and worry about future bills. I would like a full explanation and an adjustment to correct the overcharge.

incidents.description: Overcharge detected on invoice for period 2026-02-01 to 2026-02-15

socialReview.text: I was charged wrongly and the billing process needs improvement.

answers.text: I started noticing an unexpected charge on my latest bill. The amount did not match the services listed on my plan. I checked online and found there was a rate adjustment that I was not informed about. I contacted customer service, and the agent promised to review the bill but provided unclear guidance. This has caused confusion and frustration.

The billing cycle dates also seemed off, with a period starting earlier than usual. I received two separate bills for the same timeframe, which is perplexing and time consuming to resolve. The process to dispute the charges is lengthy and not user-friendly.

I tried to reach support several times, but the wait times were long and I was repeatedly transferred. The representative I spoke with did not have access to my account details, which extended the resolution time. I would expect a more proactive approach from a utility provider.

I am seeking a detailed explanation of the charges and, ideally, a credit or adjustment if there was an error. I would also appreciate a more transparent billing process and a clear timeline for when the issue will be resolved.

In the future, I would prefer to receive proactive notifications about rate changes and a straightforward way to dispute charges online. I would also like to review my bill online with an itemized breakdown.
If the issue is not resolved promptly, I may look for alternatives, including transferring service to another provider. I value good customer service and timely updates.
Overall, I want a clear explanation and a fair resolution; otherwise I may consider switching providers or contacting a regulator if the issue cannot be resolved satisfactorily.
This experience has left me cautious about future billing and more vigilant about reviewing charges. I hope the company improves its communication and billing accuracy going forward.

scores.notes: Negative sentiment aligned with billing issue.

socialReview.comment: Billing issue caused frustration; need clear explanations and faster resolution.

surveyDescription: Billing survey for customer feedback on charges

answers.text: I recently found an unexpected charge on my electricity bill for a service I didn't authorize. I also noticed the charge appeared after I changed my plan online, but the new rate was not reflected on the bill. I contacted customer support by phone and was told a manual adjustment would be processed. The representative explained that the adjustment would take two billing cycles, which felt unfair given the error was on your side. I kept paying the incorrect amount while waiting for the fix, which caused financial stress. I checked my account online and saw several line items I did not recognize, which added to my confusion. The process took longer than promised, and I had to repeat details several times. I would like the erroneous charges refunded and a clear explanation of how the billing error occurred. I hope this helps prevent similar issues for other customers.

incidents.description: Billing discrepancy after plan change causing overcharge

socialReview.text: The billing issue was frustrating and took too long to resolve.

surveyDescription: Post-transaction survey to capture billing concerns

answers.text: During the last billing cycle, I was charged for a service I did not authorize. I noticed multiple line items that I did not recognize. I contacted customer service and was told the charge would be reviewed, yet a week later the charge remains. The charges appear to be recurring charges for a service I cancelled months ago. I attempted to access my online account to dispute the charges, but the billing section kept showing an error. The discrepancies caused unexpected overdraft fees and confusion for my household. I expect a full explanation and a refund of the incorrect amount. The incorrect billing has disrupted my budgeting and created distrust in the service. I would appreciate a prompt resolution and confirmation of the corrected bill.

incidents.description: Customer reports incorrect recurring charges after cancellation.

scores.description: Negative sentiment aligned with billing issue

answers.text: I am writing because I was charged twice on my last bill. The invoice showed a duplicate line item for usage that I did not authorize. I reviewed my meter reading and it matched the prior month, so I expected a normal charge. I contacted support after noticing the extra amount and requested an adjustment. The response I received did not resolve the issue promptly, which is frustrating. The estimated credit for the duplicate charge has not appeared on my account yet. I am concerned about how billing errors are prevented and corrected. I would like a clear explanation of what happened and a fast resolution.

In addition, I was told the issue would be escalated, but I have not heard back. The time this is taking is inconvenient because I budget based on the expected charges. The online bill has a confusing breakdown, and I want a detailed, itemized explanation for every line on the invoice. The customer service experience has been unsatisfactory, with long holds and inconsistent information. I would prefer to receive a credit or reversal of the erroneous charges within 5 business days. I value transparent communication and a prompt fix to restore my trust.

incidents.description: Customer reports duplicate charge on last month's invoice.

socialReview.text: Billing issue caused frustration and distrust.
